ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do you have males and He females?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Are there sons for you, and daughters for Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Shall you have the male issues, and He the female issues?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do sons belong to you and daughters to God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What! For you the son, and for Him the daughter?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Is it for you the males and for Him the females
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! for you the males and for Him the females!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, have you males, and He females?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Are yours the males and His the females?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What! For you the males and for Him the females?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: What!-Unto YOu the males and Unto Him the females?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Are you to have males and He females?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: What! for you the male sex, and for Him, the female?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Is it for you the males and for Him the females?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, have you males, and He females!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Are you to have the males, and He the females?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Is the male for you and for Him the female?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:21] Are you to have males, and He females?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Are yours the males) people of Mecca, whom you are pleased to have for yourselves (and His the females) despite the fact that you dislike them and will not be pleased to have them for yourselves?
